doc:
Vincent Laresca https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Laresca 0 Vincent Laresca (born January 21, 1974) is an American actor. Laresca first appeared in film in the 1992 movie, Juice as Radames. Since then, he has appeared in many popular films, including The Devil's Advocate, The Aviator, Empire, Coach Carter, The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift and Baz Luhrmann's William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet. In 1997, he had a supporting role in the short-lived Fox ensemble drama 413 Hope St. He has also had major supporting roles on 24, CSI: Miami and Weeds. In 2013 Laresca took on a role as a Mexican federale and the hit man Jangles in the show Graceland. As of 2016 he landed a main role in NBC's Shades of Blue as NYPD Detective Carlos Espada, starring alongside Jennifer Lopez and Ray Liotta. Vincent_Laresca ( born January_21_,_1974 ) is an_American_actor . Laresca first appeared in film in the_1992_movie , Juice as Radames . Since then , he has_appeared in many_popular_films , including The_Devil 's_Advocate , The_Aviator_,_Empire_,_Coach_Carter , The_Fast and the_Furious : Tokyo_Drift and Baz_Luhrmann 's_William_Shakespeare 's_Romeo_+_Juliet . In 1997 , he had a_supporting_role in the_short-lived_Fox_ensemble_drama 413_Hope_St. He has_also_had major_supporting_roles on 24 , CSI : Miami_and_Weeds . In 2013_Laresca took on a_role as a_Mexican_federale and the_hit_man Jangles in the_show_Graceland . As of 2016 he landed a_main_role in NBC 's_Shades of Blue as NYPD_Detective_Carlos_Espada , starring alongside Jennifer_Lopez and Ray_Liotta .
